reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cashmere sweater to be well-made and appreciate its soft feel, perfect fit, and beautiful appearance with minimal pilling.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy!
items.body: Nice quality cashmere sweater, fits true to size. Fabric is nice weight, not too heavy and is not itchy. Great with pants, jeans or skirt. Read more
items.author: Janey Giles

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater!
items.body: I‚Äôve been looking for a red cashmere sweater for some time, but could never find the style or color i wanted. When I finally looked on Amazon, I was amazed to see this brand not only had the v-neck I prefer but it had the sweater in 3 shades of red! I ordered two for comparison and wound up keeping the Ruby. It is exactly the shade the name implies. I love it. The sweater is a quality cashmere , neither too heavy or too light. It‚Äôs soft and itch free. The styling is timeless and gently skims the body. I strongly recommend the product hand hope to be buying more colors. Read more
items.author: HBee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, perfect weight
items.body: Fit and length in size M are perfect for someone who normally wears size S and is +/- 5'4" tall. V-neck is also correct, not too low or high. Of course it pills on stress points, mine is the hip against which my shoulder bags rub. Accept that today's cashmere quality in this price range is not what we were able to buy 10-15 years ago. Read more
items.author: Therese

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it :)
items.body: I am about 135ish lbs and ordered a size medium. I feel that I could have ordered a small and it would have fit just fine. The medium is just a looser fit but does not look baggy. I am happy with this purchase as the material is super soft with just enough weight to keep me warm. I purchased it when it was on a lightning deal and if it goes back on sale I will purchase another color maybe cream or beige. I am happy with the color I purchased and it is true to the picture. I feel that this is a pretty good quality cashmere for the price I paid. Read more
items.author: Elaine

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft, 1.5 ply sweater color accurate, sizing accurate.
items.body: Shipped in sheer plastic bag, the cashmere is light weight yet not see through, color is a pale pastel pink same as ballet lighter shade of pointe shoe 2 options. True to USA sizing if your used to European sizes buy a size smaller or even 2 if available. I'm 5'8 97b LBS and wear size XXS, XS is fine if you layer. Wash with cashmere wash or dry clean. Read more
items.author: Beauty Web

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely made, no flaws
items.body: Wife loves it! Fits well and comfortable Read more
items.author: Mike F

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do NOT BUY! this is not true cashmere.
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The sweatshirt is cute, I've only worn it a few times. Never washed. and it is making little ball fuzzies. I don't think this is true cashmere. There is also a hole on the underarm. Cahemere is a bit itchy naturally, and this was a rip-off. Im not happy with the product. I would actually like my money back. Read more
items.author: Familia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Orchid, Sky, Aqua, Cream, Black, Tomato, Lime, Emerald, Bluetopaz, Teal, Oceanheather, Ruby, Grey, Petal Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
